egpreving 1.111 1115 ge11e1'111' 5 :1et. :111111 1:1:11L1 111111 111 1111111111 11111211111:
Nile :1 paper 1111 1111111111 11:11:15 5111111: 1:11'1'11111L1. which he enelflfied
111111111 11111 which was some writing, which he enclosed
with his answer. I'hL1 111111111111; 11111 the Faithful, to the Nile in
"Egypt. If thou flow of thine own accord, flow not,' but if
"it he fled. the One, the Mighty, Who museth thee to Bow,

2 G
